entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Huntsville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:12 p.m. EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain becoming mixed with drizzle this evening and ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. Rain beginning near noon. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the evening. Wind becoming west 20 near midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
